title: T205 Near Set of 165 Cards - Reduced to $9K
author: old-baseball

posts.post_title: T205 Near Set of 165 Cards - Reduced to $9K
posts.post_content:
Reduced to $9,000
[STRIKE]Now reduced to $9,500[/STRIKE].
[STRIKE]$10K start for the lot[/STRIKE].  If there's no interest I may sell some as singles.

Link to all of the cards has been added below.  I'm going to try to sell the group as a whole first.  If I can't get my asking price only then will I consider breaking up the set.  I'll be working on the pricing the set today and should have the asking price posted this evening or tomorrow.  Email me at [url]old-baseball@sbcglobal.net[/url] with questions.  

[url]http://s197.photobucket.com/user/old-baseball/library/T205%20Gold%20Borders?sort=6&page=1[/url]
